Weapon.Name: Whisperwind Dagger
Weapon.Description: A lightweight dagger that hums with an otherworldly energy, ideal for quick, silent strikes.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Grants invisibility for 5 seconds after a critical hit
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you strike, the world fades, cloaking you in shadows.

Weapon.Name: Starfire Staff
Weapon.Description: A staff pulsing with cosmic energy, carved from a rare meteorite, empowering the wielder with ancient star magic.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Casts a powerful area of effect spell, burning enemies with celestial fire
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a thrust of the staff, a burst of starfire engulfs your foes.

Weapon.Name: Echoes of the Forgotten
Weapon.Description: A two-handed sword that vibrates with the voices of past warriors, instilling fear in the hearts of enemies.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Fear aura reduces enemy attack speed by 10%
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you swing, the air fills with ancient battle cries, weakening your enemies' resolve.
